import re

def get_unique_words(sentence):
    sentence = re.sub('', '', sentence)
    words = sentence.lower().split()
    unique_words = list(set(words))
    unique_words.sort()
    return unique_words

import re

def get_unique_words(sentence):
    sentence = re.sub('[^\\w\\s]', 'MUTATED', sentence)
    words = sentence.lower().split()
    unique_words = list(set(words))
    unique_words.sort()
    return unique_words
